20110126230107.000|20110126230109.000|TR0|of protesters take to the streets of Cairo 
20110126230109.000|20110126230112.000|TR0|in a stunning explosion of rage against 
20110126230112.000|20110126230114.000|TR0|the Egyptian regime.  Our reporters on the 
20110126230114.000|20110126230117.000|TR0|scene are calling and I'm quoting them 
20110126230117.000|20110126230119.000|TR0|now, "a state of revolt."
20110126230119.000|20110126230122.000|TR0|
20110126230122.000|20110126230124.000|TR0|As push came to shove today, police used 
20110126230124.000|20110126230127.000|TR0|clubs, water cannon and tear gas against 
20110126230127.000|20110126230129.000|TR0|the crowds who are demanding the ouster of 
20110126230129.000|20110126230132.000|TR0|the President Hosni Mubarak who's been 
20110126230132.000|20110126230134.000|TR0|around for 30 years as president.
20110126230134.000|20110126230137.000|TR0|
20110126230137.000|20110126230139.000|TR0|Mubarak has been a key American ally.  
20110126230139.000|20110126230142.000|TR0|Egypt, the largest Arab nation and the 
20110126230142.000|20110126230144.000|TR0|first to make peace with Israel has been a 
20110126230144.000|20110126230147.000|TR0|source of relative stability in a very 
20110126230147.000|20110126230149.000|TR0|volatile region.
20110126230149.000|20110126230152.000|TR0|

20110126230154.000|20110126230157.000|TR0|consequences for the United States, indeed 
20110126230157.000|20110126230159.000|TR0|for the region, could be extraordinary.

20110126230219.000|20110126230222.000|TR0|state of revolt."  How bad is the

20110126230224.000|20110126230227.000|TR0|
20110126230227.000|20110126230229.000|TR0|BEN WEDEMAN, CNN SENIOR INTERNATIONAL 
20110126230229.000|20110126230232.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Well, right now it's 
20110126230232.000|20110126230234.000|TR0|relatively calm outside, but early this 
20110126230234.000|20110126230237.000|TR0|morning the Egyptian Interior Ministry put 
20110126230237.000|20110126230239.000|TR0|out a statement saying they would tolerate 
20110126230239.000|20110126230242.000|TR0|absolutely no protests whatsoever.  What 
20110126230242.000|20110126230244.000|TR0|we saw is that they tried all day to put 
20110126230244.000|20110126230247.000|TR0|down demonstrations, but every time they 
20110126230247.000|20110126230249.000|TR0|dispersed one crowd of people, another one 
20110126230249.000|20110126230252.000|TR0|went out to the streets and started to 
20110126230252.000|20110126230254.000|TR0|demonstrate.
20110126230254.000|20110126230257.000|TR0|
20110126230257.000|20110126230259.000|TR0|We've seen just up the street from here 
20110126230259.000|20110126230302.000|TR0|clashes outside the foreign ministry.  
20110126230302.000|20110126230304.000|TR0|There are hundreds, possibly thousands of 
20110126230304.000|20110126230307.000|TR0|riot police employed around the city, but 
20110126230307.000|20110126230309.000|TR0|they simply don't seem to be able to quell 
20110126230309.000|20110126230312.000|TR0|the protests.
20110126230312.000|20110126230314.000|TR0|
20110126230314.000|20110126230317.000|TR0|We're hearing from the city of Suez, which 
20110126230317.000|20110126230319.000|TR0|is on the Suez Canal, about an hour and a 
20110126230319.000|20110126230322.000|TR0|half drive from here and in that city 
20110126230322.000|20110126230324.000|TR0|protesters have taken over down parts of 
20110126230324.000|20110126230327.000|TR0|the downtown area and have torched 
20110126230327.000|20110126230329.000|TR0|government buildings.

20110126230334.000|20110126230337.000|TR0|how to react to all of this.  President 
20110126230337.000|20110126230339.000|TR0|Hosni Mubarak has made no statements about 
20110126230339.000|20110126230342.000|TR0|these protests.  In fact, his only public 
20110126230342.000|20110126230344.000|TR0|appearance was at a meeting with the emir 
20110126230344.000|20110126230347.000|TR0|of the Bahrain where they discussed the 
20110126230347.000|20110126230349.000|TR0|situation in Palestine -- Wolf.

20110126230425.000|20110126230427.000|TR0|regular basis, but they're always small, 
20110126230427.000|20110126230430.000|TR0|Wolf.  A 100 people, 150 people, 10,000

20110126230432.000|20110126230435.000|TR0|city has not seen since 1997 when you had 
20110126230435.000|20110126230437.000|TR0|the bread riots under President Anwar

20110126230445.000|20110126230447.000|TR0|they've been blocking Twitter, Facebook, 
20110126230447.000|20110126230450.000|TR0|some internet traffic.  What roles are the 
20110126230450.000|20110126230452.000|TR0|social network sites playing in all of 
20110126230452.000|20110126230455.000|TR0|this?
20110126230455.000|20110126230457.000|TR0|
20110126230457.000|20110126230500.000|TR0|WEDEMAN:  A massive role, really.  It was 
20110126230500.000|20110126230502.000|TR0|two Facebook groups that came up with the 
20110126230502.000|20110126230505.000|TR0|idea of the big demonstration yesterday.  
20110126230505.000|20110126230507.000|TR0|Words spread through the internet, through 
20110126230507.000|20110126230510.000|TR0|Twitter and through text messaging.  And I 
20110126230510.000|20110126230512.000|TR0|can tell you, the entire press corps in 
20110126230512.000|20110126230515.000|TR0|Cairo, Egyptian and international, we're 
20110126230515.000|20110126230517.000|TR0|stunned because we were expecting 
20110126230517.000|20110126230520.000|TR0|yesterday limited demonstrations in 
20110126230520.000|20110126230522.000|TR0|various parts of town.
20110126230522.000|20110126230525.000|TR0|
20110126230525.000|20110126230527.000|TR0|But I can tell you that sort of my moment 
20110126230527.000|20110126230530.000|TR0|of profound realization was I was driving 
20110126230530.000|20110126230532.000|TR0|in a taxi underneath one of the main 
20110126230532.000|20110126230535.000|TR0|bridges over the Nile and I looked up and 
20110126230535.000|20110126230537.000|TR0|the bridge was completely full of people 
20110126230537.000|20110126230540.000|TR0|thousands of people who had apparently 
20110126230540.000|20110126230542.000|TR0|come from Cairo University pouring over 
20110126230542.000|20110126230545.000|TR0|the Nile into the center of the city.
20110126230545.000|20110126230547.000|TR0|
20110126230547.000|20110126230550.000|TR0|This social networking whether it's 
20110126230550.000|20110126230552.000|TR0|Twitter, Facebook or texting has really 
20110126230552.000|20110126230555.000|TR0|helped mobilize and organize people in a 
20110126230555.000|20110126230557.000|TR0|way that most people never expected - Wolf.

20110126230858.000|20110126230900.000|TR0|former U.S. ambassador to Morocco.  Like

20110126230923.000|20110126230925.000|TR0|violence that would disrupt something else 
20110126230925.000|20110126230928.000|TR0|near and dear to the west.     (on 
20110126230928.000|20110126230930.000|TR0|camera):  Oil could be in the balance 
20110126230930.000|20110126230933.000|TR0|here.  Not only because of Egypt's 
20110126230933.000|20110126230935.000|TR0|production of oil, but because of the Suez

20110126230943.000|20110126230945.000|TR0|everything and Egypt controls the canal, 
20110126230945.000|20110126230948.000|TR0|which is a key transshipment point.  Not

20110126230958.000|20110126231000.000|TR0|of the region in Egypt.

20110126231043.000|20110126231045.000|TR0|

20110126231048.000|20110126231050.000|TR0|reason for concern here. Like the Shah's 
20110126231050.000|20110126231053.000|TR0|regime in the late '70s, here in Egypt you 
20110126231053.000|20110126231055.000|TR0|have a key U.S. ally, a key player in oil 
20110126231055.000|20110126231058.000|TR0|production, a huge population, very 
20110126231058.000|20110126231100.000|TR0|influential in the region.  Once Iran went 
20110126231100.000|20110126231103.000|TR0|to the Islamic hardliners, the entire

20110126231108.000|20110126231110.000|TR0|watching very closely here in Egypt.
20110126231110.000|20110126231113.000|TR0|
20110126231113.000|20110126231115.000|TR0|BLITZER:  And they're watching closely 
20110126231115.000|20110126231118.000|TR0|because they don't know how important or 
20110126231118.000|20110126231120.000|TR0|how significant these demonstrations.  The 
20110126231120.000|20110126231123.000|TR0|Muslim Brotherhood, which has been banned 
20110126231123.000|20110126231125.000|TR0|although tolerated to a certain degree in 
20110126231125.000|20110126231128.000|TR0|Egypt, really is.
20110126231128.000|20110126231130.000|TR0|
20110126231130.000|20110126231133.000|TR0|All right, Brian, thanks very much.

20110126233353.000|20110126233355.000|TR0|this year.  What would you do to eliminate 
20110126233355.000|20110126233358.000|TR0|that deficit?
20110126233358.000|20110126233400.000|TR0|
20110126233400.000|20110126233403.000|TR0|SANDERS:  Well, for a start, we lose about 
20110126233403.000|20110126233405.000|TR0|$100 billion every single year by 
20110126233405.000|20110126233408.000|TR0|corporate interests and wealthy people who 
20110126233408.000|20110126233410.000|TR0|use tax havens in the Cayman Islands and 
20110126233410.000|20110126233413.000|TR0|Bermuda; don't pay their fair share of

20110126233416.000|20110126233418.000|TR0|hypocritical for our Republican friends to

20110126233423.000|20110126233426.000|TR0|successfully, for hundreds of billions of

20110126234439.000|20110126234442.000|TR0|reported in the online edition of the 
20110126234442.000|20110126234444.000|TR0|"Washington Post."  That Jared Loughner 
20110126234444.000|20110126234447.000|TR0|spent time on the Internet searching for 
20110126234447.000|20110126234449.000|TR0|information about people who had committed 
20110126234449.000|20110126234452.000|TR0|political assassinations.
20110126234452.000|20110126234454.000|TR0|

20110126234457.000|20110126234459.000|TR0|had researched but said the Web surfing 
20110126234459.000|20110126234502.000|TR0|took place in the weeks and days leading 
20110126234502.000|20110126234504.000|TR0|up to the shooting of Gabrielle Giffords.  
20110126234504.000|20110126234507.000|TR0|This source says Loughner also looked at 
20110126234507.000|20110126234509.000|TR0|information about lethal injections and 
20110126234509.000|20110126234512.000|TR0|solitary confinement.
20110126234512.000|20110126234514.000|TR0|
20110126234514.000|20110126234517.000|TR0|This was gleaned, of course, from the 
20110126234517.000|20110126234519.000|TR0|forensic examination of Loughner's 
20110126234519.000|20110126234522.000|TR0|personal computer, which was seized after 
20110126234522.000|20110126234524.000|TR0|the Tucson shootings, Wolf.
20110126234524.000|20110126234527.000|TR0|
20110126234527.000|20110126234529.000|TR0|BLITZER:  What impact, Jeanne, could all 
20110126234529.000|20110126234532.000|TR0|of this have on the prosecution?
20110126234532.000|20110126234534.000|TR0|
20110126234534.000|20110126234537.000|TR0|MESERVE:  Well, Wolf, it would appear to 
20110126234537.000|20110126234539.000|TR0|undermine a possible insanity defense.  
20110126234539.000|20110126234542.000|TR0|Because it looks like Loughner knew his 
20110126234542.000|20110126234544.000|TR0|actions were wrong and he was aware of the 
20110126234544.000|20110126234547.000|TR0|possible consequences.
20110126234547.000|20110126234549.000|TR0|
20110126234549.000|20110126234552.000|TR0|But one attorney versed in the insanity 
20110126234552.000|20110126234554.000|TR0|defense says that is not necessarily true.
20110126234554.000|20110126234557.000|TR0|
20110126234557.000|20110126234559.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20110126234559.000|20110126234602.000|TR0|
20110126234602.000|20110126234604.000|TR0|BARRY BOSS, COZEN O'CONNOR LAW FIRM:  What 
20110126234604.000|20110126234607.000|TR0|people are going to automatically conclude 
20110126234607.000|20110126234609.000|TR0|is that obviously he knew what he was 
20110126234609.000|20110126234612.000|TR0|doing. He planned this.  And he wasn't

20110126234624.000|20110126234627.000|TR0|conclusion is premature, because you don't

20110126234629.000|20110126234632.000|TR0|those things. And you are coming at it

20110126235708.000|20110126235711.000|TR0|MOOS:  Some spotted a woman with long hair 
20110126235711.000|20110126235713.000|TR0|on the piano, which conjures up images of 
20110126235713.000|20110126235716.000|TR0|Michelle Pfeiffer singing "Making Whoopee."
20110126235716.000|20110126235718.000|TR0|
20110126235718.000|20110126235721.000|TR0|(MUSIC: "MAKING WHOOPEE")
20110126235721.000|20110126235723.000|TR0|
20110126235723.000|20110126235726.000|TR0|MOOS:  Instead, try picturing these two 
20110126235726.000|20110126235728.000|TR0|lugging an old piano out into Biscayne 
20110126235728.000|20110126235731.000|TR0|Bay.  William Yeager called CNN, saying he 
20110126235731.000|20110126235733.000|TR0|and fellow filmmaker Anais Yeager did the 
20110126235733.000|20110126235736.000|TR0|deed, a claim we can't confirm, while 
20110126235736.000|20110126235738.000|TR0|making a film called "Jesus of Malibu" 
20110126235738.000|20110126235741.000|TR0|about a spiritual journey across North 
20110126235741.000|20110126235743.000|TR0|America.
20110126235743.000|20110126235746.000|TR0|
20110126235746.000|20110126235748.000|TR0|UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE:  I want you to help 
20110126235748.000|20110126235751.000|TR0|me to change the world.
20110126235751.000|20110126235753.000|TR0|
20110126235753.000|20110126235756.000|TR0|MOOS:  Yeager told "The Miami New Times" 
20110126235756.000|20110126235758.000|TR0|it took them six hours to get the piano 
20110126235758.000|20110126235801.000|TR0|out to the sandbar.  They pulled a 
20110126235801.000|20110126235803.000|TR0|homemade barge behind a boat and say 
20110126235803.000|20110126235806.000|TR0|they've left pianos in other places from 
20110126235806.000|20110126235808.000|TR0|Malibu to Death Valley.  He called this 
20110126235808.000|20110126235811.000|TR0|one "highly symbolic and profound."
20110126235811.000|20110126235813.000|TR0|
20110126235813.000|20110126235816.000|TR0|Less profound is the "Miami Herald's" 
20110126235816.000|20110126235818.000|TR0|caption contest.  The entries range from 
20110126235818.000|20110126235821.000|TR0|"You can tune a piano but you can't tuna 
20110126235821.000|20110126235823.000|TR0|fish" to our favorite, "Play it again, 
20110126235823.000|20110126235826.000|TR0|sand."
20110126235826.000|20110126235828.000|TR0|
20110126235828.000|20110126235831.000|TR0|INGMAR BERGMAN, ACTRESS:  Play it, Sam.
20110126235831.000|20110126235833.000|TR0|
20110126235833.000|20110126235836.000|TR0|(MUSIC: "YOU MUST REMEMBER THIS")
20110126235836.000|20110126235838.000|TR0|
20110126235838.000|20110126235841.000|TR0|MOOS:  Jeanne Moos, CNN --
20110126235841.000|20110126235843.000|TR0|
20110126235843.000|20110126235846.000|TR0|UNIDENTIFIED MALE (singing):  As time goes 
20110126235846.000|20110126235848.000|TR0|by.
20110126235848.000|20110126235851.000|TR0|
20110126235851.000|20110126235853.000|TR0|MOOS:  New York.
